get.summary: Retrieve a list of paginated document Anchors
get.description:
**Infos:**
**Per_page:** This attribute only specify the **maximum potential** result count.
Even if there's still more results to be fetched, the result count could be **less or equal** than the asked per_page.

**Keywords:** Used for both the simple and advanced search.
Required with the **simple search** or if the template id or the template type id **are not provided** with advance search.

parameters.name: advancedSearch
parameters.description: Specified whether this request should be an advanced search or not

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: (**AdvancedSearch**) Is required if no keyword or template type id are provided.

parameters.name: templateTypeId
parameters.description: (**AdvancedSearch**) Is required if no keyword or template id are provided.

parameters.name: fieldIds[]
parameters.description: (**AdvancedSearch**) Will search the keywords only on these global fields when specified.

parameters.name: exactWord
parameters.description: (**AdvancedSearch**) If true, will only search for words that exactly match the keywords

200.description: The paginated list of document Anchors

401.description: A message indicating that the user is unauthenticated

403.description: A message indicating that the user cannot have access to the resource

422.description: Some query params are malformatted or are missing

post.summary: Execute the transition of a document anchor

toSign.description: Whether or not to apply a signature to the document

signatureFieldIds.description: Field ids contained in the signature metadata

overridePendingProgramExecution.description: Whether or not to cancel the current pending program and force the execution of a new one

userIds.description: If the user logged in to the API is not assigned to the step and is admin, this parameter allows you to specify for which user (s) he performs the transition by specifying a list of user id. Default : Connected API user only.

200.description: The transition process has been executed

message.example: La transaction s'est droul avec succs

splitPages.description: Create an expense for each page in the uploaded file.

first.description: Link to the first page of the paginated resource

last.description: Link to the last page of the paginated resource

prev.description: Link to the previous page of the paginated resource

next.description: Link to the next page of the paginated resource

current_page.description: The current page of the paginated resource

from.description: The index of the first resource returned in this request

last_page.description: The last page of the paginated resource

path.description: The base URL to access this resource

per_page.description: The quantity to show per page

to.description: The index of the last resource returned in this request

total.description: The total amount of resource that match this request

expenseStatus.description:
Expense status:
  * 0 - PROCESSING
  * 1 - PENDING_CONFIRMATION
  * 2 - COMPLETED
  * 3 - SUBMITTED

expensePostMethods.description:
Save methods:
  * Put - Creates and send expenses to AI-Services
  * Patch - Updates the expense
  * Post - Creates if required and confirms (completed status) the expense. *No AI-Services
